Body:
I am trying read data from USB device using data reader object. The code is 

public async void Run(IBackgroundTaskInstance taskInstance)	    {		        deferral = taskInstance.GetDeferral();	        await config();	        await WriteAsync();	        while(true)	        await ReadAsync()	        deferral.Complete();		    }	async Task config()	{	  ....	}	 async Task WriteAsync()	{	  ....	}		 async Task ReadAsync()	{	  try	        {		            dataReaderObject = new DataReader(serialPort.InputStream);		            var bytesRead = await dataReaderObject.LoadAsync(1);	            if (bytesRead > 0)	            {		                string a = dataReaderObject.ReadString(bytesRead).Trim();	                byte[] pass_byte = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(a);	                Debug.WriteLine(pass_byte[0]);			            }	        }	        catch (Exception e)	        {	            Debug.WriteLine(exception in read async"
column9:
e); } }

I was able to get data as intended but for a little amount of time after that
column10:
It throws an exception. It shows exceptions likearguments out of range exception and SEHE exception

"

Body: Looks like your have a encoding problem. Did you try using ReadBytes instead of ReadString?

'    System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException occurred	  HResult=-2147023783	  Message=No mapping for the Unicode character exists in the target multi-byte code page.		No mapping for the Unicode character exists in the target multi-byte code page.		  Source="	  StackTrace:	       at Windows.Storage.Streams.DataReader.ReadString(UInt32 codeUnitCount)	       at gridbackground.StartupTask.<ReadAsync>d__8.MoveNext()	  InnerException:'
The above were the exceptions from the line                                       `string a=dataReaderObject.ReadString.ASCII.GetBytes(a);`
Thank you Jackie That fixed the problem
